readme:
# Atom Fold Comments

Quickly toggle folding on all block comments with `ctrl+shift+/`.

![screenshot](https://i.cloudup.com/rrXaFlda9t.gif)

# Autofolding

You can specify comments autofolding on file opening with next config option

```
"fold-comments":
  autofold: true
```
